short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The smoothest way to share company news to your team. Reinforce company identity, reduce information stress.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Give your organization's members a new tab page branded to your company's colors. Share company news in a smooth and stress-free way. We don't pop notifications in users faces! Just make information accessible and make people love your company.
